remarks: Restricted existential specialization, using implicit substitution. Variant of ~ rspcedvd for equations, in which the right hand side depends on the quantified variable.  (Contributed by AV, 24-Dec-2019.)
statement:
rspcedeqvd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
rspcedeqvd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> C = D ) $.
rspcedeq2vd $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. B C = D ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
